entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:04 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
